none.description:
{Divine Strength}

Causes the selected friendly unit to inflict maximum damage in combat. Removes Curse effect. Does not affect undead.

basic.description:
{Basic Divine Strength}

Causes the selected friendly unit to inflict maximum damage in combat. Removes Curse effect. Does not affect undead.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Divine Strength}

Causes the selected friendly unit to inflict damage greater than their normal maximum damange in combat by 1. Removes Curse effect. Does not affect undead.

expert.description:
{Expert Divine Strength}

Causes all friendly units to inflict damage greater than their normal maximum damange in combat by 1. Removes Curse effect. Does not affect undead.

none.description:
{Cleansing}

Removes all spells and effects except Disrupting Ray and Poison from a friendly unit. Ignores target creature's natural immunities to magic.

basic.description:
{Basic Cleansing}

Removes all spells and effects except Disrupting Ray and Poison from a friendly unit. Ignores target creature's natural immunities to magic.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Cleansing}

Removes all spells and effects except Disrupting Ray and Poison from a friendly or hostile unit. Ignores target creature's natural immunities to magic.

expert.description:
{Expert Cleansing}

Removes all spells and effects except Disrupting Ray and Poison from all units on the battlefield and destroys all magic obstacles. Ignores target creatures' chances to resist spells and natural immunities to magic.

none.description:
{Prayer}

Bestows a +2 bonus to the Attack strength, Defense strength, and Speed of the selected friendly unit.

basic.description:
{Basic Prayer}

Bestows a +2 bonus to the Attack strength, Defense strength, and Speed of the selected friendly unit.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Prayer}

Bestows a +4 bonus to the Attack strength, Defense strength, and Speed of the selected friendly unit.

expert.description:
{Expert Prayer}

Bestows a +5 bonus to the Attack strength, Defense strength, and Speed of all friendly units.

none.description:
{Levitation}

Causes magical clouds to lift the target friendly troop, allowing it to fly until they attack.

basic.description:
{Basic Levitation}

Causes magical clouds to lift the target friendly troop, allowing it to fly until they attack.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Levitation}

Causes magical clouds to lift the target friendly troop, allowing it to fly.

expert.description:
{Expert Levitation}

Causes magical clouds to lift all friendly troops, allowing them to fly.

none.description:
{Confusion}

Causes target enemy troop to become confused and unable to retaliate once.

basic.description:
{Basic Confusion}

Causes target enemy troop to become confused and unable to retaliate once.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Confusion}

Causes target enemy troop to become confused and unable to retaliate.

expert.description:
{Expert Confusion}

Causes all enemy troops to become confused and unable to retaliate.

none.description:
{Vigour}

Target friendly troop will strike twice upon its next melee attack.

basic.description:
{Basic Vigour}

Target friendly troop will strike twice upon its next melee attack.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Vigour}

Target friendly troop will strike twice upon its next melee attack.

expert.description:
{Expert Vigour}

All friendly troops will strike twice upon their next melee attack.

{Expert Puppet Master}

Puppeteers an enemy troop under your control until they take damage.
